snippet.title: AVGN Adventures Official Launch Trailer - Now on Steam!
snippet.description:
The original AVGN games are now a part of AVGN 1 + 2 Deluxe!!!
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/angry-video-game-nerd-1-and-2-deluxe-switch/
Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1162960/Angry_Video_Game_Nerd_I__II_Deluxe/
Visit http://avgngame.com for more info and game merch!
